sentences.en: A brief rest restored the traveller's vigour.
sentences.cn: 经过短暂的休息,那些旅行者又恢复了精力.

sentences.en: After a cup of tea, she felt quite restored.
sentences.cn: 喝了一杯茶后，她感觉恢复了精力。

sentences.en: As they smiled at each other, harmony was restored again.
sentences.cn: 他们彼此微笑的时候，又恢复了往日的和睦。

sentences.en: Electricity lines to 30,000 homes were gradually being restored yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天，3万户家庭逐渐恢复了供电。

sentences.en: He said the ousted president must be restored to power.
sentences.cn: 他说被赶下台的总统必须重新掌权。

sentences.en: If breathing is not restored, the patient may go into spasm.
sentences.cn: 如果不能恢复呼吸, 这个病人就会发生抽搐.

sentences.en: Knowing that she had arrived safely restored my peace of mind.
sentences.cn: 得知她平安到达,我就安心了.

sentences.en: Peace and order were finally restored in the town.
sentences.cn: 这个城镇终于恢复了治安与平静.

sentences.en: Restored films are being showcased this month at a festival in Paris.
sentences.cn: 本月的巴黎电影节将展映一些修复版的电影。

sentences.en: The brandy made him choke, but it restored his nerve.
sentences.cn: 虽说白兰地呛了他一下，却让他恢复了勇气。

sentences.en: The house has been restored to its original splendour.
sentences.cn: 这座房子已经恢复了当初的光彩.

sentences.en: The house has been restored with loving care.
The rectory has been sensitively restored and tastefully furnished.
sentences.cn: 教区长的故居已被精心修复，里面的陈设也颇为雅致。

sentences.en: The stolen goods were all restored to their owners.
sentences.cn: 被偷窃的东西都归还给原主了.

sentences.en: These restored houses overhang a system of quiet canals.
sentences.cn: 这些修葺一新的房屋俯视着静静流淌的运河河网。

sentences.en: You will be restored to health in a matter of days.

words.tran_cn: 精力充沛的；精力恢复的
修复（restore的过去式）；恢复健康

trans.tran_cn: 归还( restore的过去式和过去分词 )，交还，使恢复，修复
